mapper.sql: id, project_id, density_unit_id, viscosity_kinematic_unit_id, viscosity_dynamic_unit_id, length_unit_id, diameter_unit_id, wall_thickness_unit_id, roughness_unit_id
mapper.select: select pu.*, du.id as did , du.unit as dunit, vku.id as vkuid , vku.unit as vkuunit, vdu.id as vduid , vdu.unit as vduunit from project_unit pu , density_unit du , viscosity_kinematic_unit vku , viscosity_dynamic_unit vdu where pu.project_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and pu.density_unit_id = du.id and pu.viscosity_kinematic_unit_id = vku.id and pu.viscosity_dynamic_unit_id = vdu.id
mapper.insert: insert into project_unit (id, project_id, density_unit_id, viscosity_kinematic_unit_id, viscosity_dynamic_unit_id, length_unit_id, diameter_unit_id, wall_thickness_unit_id, roughness_unit_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{densityUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viscosityKinematicUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viscosityDynamicUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lengthUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diameterUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wallThicknessUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roughnessUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
